entries.summary: PATCH: EU AI Act refs normalization, Annex IV bundle completeness, optional JNC schema and validator check, validator audit report outputs (audit-json/audit-html).

details.description: EU AI Act references normalization (Docs/SSOT); mapping remains informative, not legal advice
Annex IV profile and sample bundle mappings; signatures/hashes/payload completeness
Optional JNC schema and validator check (informative)
Validator audit report outputs (audit-json, audit-html)

entries.summary: PATCH: Optional signature metadata, Coverage Map audit_questions, Normative/Informative clarifications, v0.2 roadmap, EU AI Act Annex IV sample bundle.

details.description: Evidence Bundle signing optional metadata (signer_identity, signed_at, verification_command, canonicalization)
Coverage Map audit_questions (informative)
Normative vs Informative table; standard governance (VERSIONING.md)
v0.2 roadmap (informative); JNC informative doc
Validator JSON output includes signing_metadata when present
EU AI Act Annex IV sample Evidence Bundle and profile with audit_questions

entries.summary: Initial release of AIMO Standard with 8-dimension code system and Evidence Pack templates.

details.description: Functional Scope dimension with 6 codes (FS-001 to FS-006)
Use Case Class dimension with 10 codes (UC-001 to UC-010)
Data Type dimension with 8 codes (DT-001 to DT-008)
Channel dimension with 6 codes (CH-001 to CH-006)
Integration Mode dimension with 5 codes (IM-001 to IM-005)
Risk Surface dimension with 5 codes (RS-001 to RS-005)
Outcome / Benefit dimension with 5 codes (OB-001 to OB-005)
Log/Event Type dimension (LG) with 7 codes (LG-001 to LG-007); EV reserved for Evidence artifact IDs only
taxonomy_pack.schema.json for taxonomy pack definition
changelog.schema.json for changelog entries
evidence_pack_manifest.schema.json for Evidence Pack manifests
Evidence Pack templates EV-01 through EV-07
